title: #205 - Jim Norton, Sam Roberts, & ME
description:
Comedian Jim Norton & "The Last Professional Broadcaster" Sam Roberts stop by the MANCAVE to talk about Amy Schumer, their time on the Opie & Anthony show, Jim's departure, & their new program "The Jim Norton & Sam Roberts Show" on XM 103/Sirius 206. 

MY Hour special "THE MACHINE" airs NOVEMBER 11th on Showtime at 10pm!

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
